Description:
Detects potential suspicious child processes of "jamf". Could be a sign of potential abuse of Jamf as a C2 server as seen by Typhon MythicAgent.

Author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: JAMF MDM Potential Suspicious Child Process
Query: sourcetype like 'macos-%' eql select * from _source_ where parent_process_path like '%/jamf' and (process_path like '%/bash' or process_path like '%/sh')
